document.topic_text: Private Placement 12 Aug 2016 11:22 L&T Infrastructure Finance Company Ltd has informed BSE that the Company intends to issue Unsecured, Redeemable, Non-Convertible Debentures in the nature of subordinated, Tier-II Debt of the face value of Rs. 10,00,000/- (Rupees Ten Lakhs) each, amounting to Rs. 25 Crore with an option to retain over subscription of Rs. 25 Crore (Series "L" 2016-17_Subdebt), on private placement basis.
